translations: 提出诉讼，打官司（litigate 的现在分词形式）

sentences.sentence: We're not litigating. If we wanted to we would have done so years ago.
sentences.translation: 我们没有对簿公堂，如果我们想，在数年之前就已经完成了。

sentences.sentence: Perhaps Deming and her attorneys should be litigating against more culpable targets?
sentences.translation: 也许戴明和她的律师应该对更应受到谴责的目标诉讼？

sentences.sentence: But I have no interest in spending our time re-litigating the policies of the last eight years.
sentences.translation: 但我没有兴趣让我们花时间再对过去8年的政策争论不休。
